```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(ggrepel)
library(gghighlight)
library(paletteer)
library(ggExtra)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```


```{r}

ggplot(data = BQ2, aes(x = sample_date, y = k)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic() +
   facet_wrap(~k, ncol = 1, scales = "free")
  labs(title = "Comparing levels of Potassium and Nitrates in the Luiquillo River", x = "Year", y = "K (mg)")
  

```
